00036 #include "PACC/Util/Randomizer.hpp"
00037 #include <sstream>
00038 
00039 using namespace std;
00040 using namespace PACC;
00041 
00042 Randomizer PACC::rand;
00043 
00046 string Randomizer::getState(void) const
00047 {
00048     ostringstream lStream;
00049     for(unsigned i = 0; i < N; ++i) lStream << state[i] << ",";
00050     lStream << left;
00051     return lStream.str();
00052 }
00053 
00056 void Randomizer::setState(const string& inState)
00057 {
00058     istringstream lStream(inState);
00059     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
00060         lStream >> state[i];
00061         lStream.get();
00062     }
00063     lStream >> left;
00064     pNext = &state[N-left];
00065 }
